MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA15 postcode area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:08pm. Our engineers have arrived at Kilblain Street substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:01pm on Monday, 12 October 2020
